str2: Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report. From martus; to be a witness, i.e. Testify.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to look closely at, i.e. perceive; by extension to visit.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A dove, pigeon. Of uncertain derivation; a pigeon.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
